results.name: a(n) = A007895(A113175(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..17711
program: A113175(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = fibonacci(f[i, 1])); factorback(f); };
A072649(n) = { my(m); if(n<1, 0, m=0; until(fibonacci(m)>n, m++); m-2); }; \\ From A072649
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 14 2019
